text:
It would be nice if I could specify a css that would be included in all served 
pages.  It would be helpful if I could include css files or other <head> parts 
like a <link> or <meta>.  Even over-riding the <title> would be nice.

Should I include this feature request in the 2.0 database as well?
creator: robertsearle@hotmail.com
slive@apache.org
text:
We aren't really in the business of mucking with content on the way out of
the server; we just send it.  There are, however, third party modules
like mod_layout that can do pretty much exactly what you want.  Google
should find it for you.

As far as mod_autoindex goes, yes it would be nice to be able to specify
a stylesheet.  But I'm sure that's not going to happen with Apache 1.3,
which is basically in bug-fix mode.

If you want that for 2.0, please file a more specific feature-request
but report on the 2.0 version.

Thanks for using Apache!
